### Load source codes

```{r}
library(tidyverse)


unit_source_codes <- read.csv('source_codes.csv')
unit_source_codes$TARGET_CONCEPT_NAME <- NULL
unit_source_codes
```

### Run Pipeline


```{r}
mapping <- unit_source_codes %>% rename_all(tolower) %>%
  Orest::runMappingPipeline(
    tbl = .,
    pathToOrest = '.',
    source_code_field = TRUE
  )
```

### Inspect results

```{r}
mapping
```
